FuncDef: The reset arp remote-backup command clears the original ARP entries and backs up ARP entries again.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the original ARP entries and backs up ARP entries again on a specified interface.
-

Clears the original ARP entries and backs up ARP entries again on a device.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear the original ARP entries and back up ARP entries again, run the reset arp remote-backup command.
Configuration Impact
After an ARP entry is cleared, the mapping between the IP and MAC addresses in the entry is cleared. As a result, users may fail to access the network, and services may be interrupted.
